function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of contagious diseases in urban environments","Impact":"Threatens human liveability, increases pressure on infrastructure, and affects availability of medical services","Mitigation":"Implementation of enhanced health and disease protocols, construction of specialized healthcare facilities, and innovative use of available spaces","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, rapid construction technologies, innovative design solutions for public spaces","People":"Urban residents and healthcare workers","Owner":"Governments, healthcare organizations, and urban planning authorities"}]}
